txt.en:
'Prospectors are the most necessary workers in this event. Without the assistance of prospectors, the forge fires will fail, and the hard tack will not bake. The efforts, ingredients, and time spent by the great cooks of Thorin's Hall would be for naught. No, worse, for a great loss. We will not let this happen.

'And this, my friend, is where prospectors come in. The ever-burning ore located in this mine burns hotter and longer than any coal we have yet to find. However, there is a problem. The ore is extremely volatile and needs great care when being removed from the lodestone herein. It is time-consuming and dangerous.

'Overseer Skuld Scentlode will track the progress of all prospectors and provide prospectors with details of the undertakings needed to support the efforts in the kitchens above.'
